title: What is the importance of ENIAC? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is an answer for those too lazy to google. The ENIAC was a large-scale, general purpose digital electronic computer. Built out of some 17,468 electronic vacuum tubes, ENIAC was in its time the largest single electronic apparatus in the world. There were two fundamental technical innovations in the ENIAC. Oh look! someone has asked the same question before? Was this ANOTHER lazy student looking to copy and paste their homework assignment? Why is ENIAC considered to be one of the most important inventions in history? ENIAC Still Influencing Enterprise IT 68 Years Later The Brief History of the ENIAC Computer The birth of the computer
“What is the importance of ENIAC?” It was one of the first general purpose computers ever made. ENIAC - Wikipedia
